hero.headline: Welcome to the World of Sourdough
hero.name: Reut David
hero.sub: Real Bread. Homemade. Just Like It Used to Be.

story.p1: It was during the COVID days. I was home with two little toddlers.
story.p2: One day, I saw someone baking sourdough bread — and something about it pulled me in. I told myself: I want this too.
story.p3: I reached out to my cousin, Neta, and she patiently walked me through the basics — starter, feedings, folding, fermentation, oven steam, and more.
story.p4: My first loaves? Total failure. Flat. Dense. Too sour.
story.p5: But I didn't give up. I learned. I tried again. I read, I asked questions, I made mistakes, I improved. And I kept going.
